sectionSubtitle: Click a marker to explore project details
ctaText: Want to see more? Check out my GitHub profile for additional projects.

projects.title: Perry's Ice Cream — Production Optimization
projects.shortDescription: Identified hidden capacity losses via regression and time-series analytics to optimize production line throughput.
bullets: Analyzed speed, downtime, and SKU mix to identify hidden capacity
Quantified impact of heavy SKUs and restarts on throughput
Recommended changes to unlock capacity without new machines
projects.outcome: Delivered operational recommendations to increase throughput by 15%

projects.title: Nexus Logistics — Training Analytics
projects.shortDescription: Applied PCA and clustering to reveal employee learning preference groups and improve training completion.
bullets: Applied PCA to reduce dimensionality of training metrics
Used K-Means clustering to identify learning preference groups
Built data-driven recommendations for HR team

projects.title: Lenskart — Social Media Analytics
projects.shortDescription: Built Power BI dashboards analyzing influencer campaigns across multiple platforms.
bullets: Created comprehensive Power BI dashboards for campaign tracking
projects.outcome: Achieved 500K impressions and 15% improvement in reach

projects.title: Daily Grind — Pricing Strategy
projects.shortDescription: Developed dynamic pricing model and implemented JIT/FIFO inventory management system.
bullets: Built pricing model based on demand patterns
projects.outcome: Achieved 25% cost reduction while boosting revenue

projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction
projects.shortDescription: Developed ML model to predict customer churn and enable proactive retention strategies.
bullets: Built ensemble model combining XGBoost and Random Forest
Identified top 10 churn indicators from 50+ features
Created automated scoring pipeline for real-time predictions
